definitions.text: an urban area with a fixed boundary that is smaller than a city
examples: they drive through town on their way to work

definitions.text: the people living in a municipality smaller than a city
examples: the whole town cheered the team

definitions.text: an administrative division of a county
examples: the town is responsible for snow removal

definitions.text: United States architect who was noted for his design and construction of truss bridges (1784-1844)
